statements: SELECT * FROM StockPricePrediction;
SELECT id, date, opening_price FROM StockPricePrediction;
SELECT date, closing_price FROM StockPricePrediction WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM StockPricePrediction WHERE date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT id, high_price, low_price FROM StockPricePrediction ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM StockPricePrediction WHERE opening_price > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, date, closing_price FROM StockPricePrediction WHERE closing_price < 50 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT date, high_price, low_price FROM StockPricePrediction WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-01';
SELECT id, opening_price, closing_price FROM StockPricePrediction WHERE opening_price < 80 AND closing_price > 100 ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM StockPricePrediction WHERE closing_price > opening_price AND high_price > low_price;
SELECT stock_name, closing_price FROM stock_data WHERE stock_id = 1;
SELECT stock_name, market_date FROM stock_data WHERE closing_price > 100;
SELECT * FROM model_predictions WHERE prediction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT stock_name, predicted_price FROM stock_data INNER JOIN model_predictions ON stock_data.stock_id = model_predictions.stock_id;
SELECT DISTINCT stock_id, stock_name FROM stock_data ORDER BY stock_id DESC;
SELECT stock_name, closing_price FROM stock_data WHERE market_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM stock_data WHERE closing_price > 100 ORDER BY market_date DESC;
SELECT prediction_date, predicted_price FROM model_predictions WHERE stock_id = 1 AND prediction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT stock_name, market_date, closing_price FROM stock_data JOIN model_predictions ON stock_data.stock_id = model_predictions.stock_id WHERE stock_name LIKE 'AAPL%' ORDER BY market_date ASC;

SELECT stock_name, prediction_date, predicted_price FROM stock_data JOIN model_predictions ON stock_data.stock_id = model_predictions.stock_id WHERE market_date = '2022-01-01' AND closing_price < predicted_price ORDER BY predicted_price DESC;
SELECT stock_name, market_cap FROM stock_data
SELECT stock_name, historical_data FROM stock_data
SELECT * FROM technical_indicators WHERE date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT stock_id, rsi FROM technical_indicators WHERE rsi > 70
SELECT stock_id, forecast_date, forecast_price FROM stock_forecast
SELECT * FROM stock_data WHERE stock_id = 1
SELECT stock_name, market_cap FROM stock_data WHERE market_cap > 1000000
SELECT * FROM technical_indicators WHERE rsi > 70 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT stock_name, forecast_price FROM stock_data INNER JOIN stock_forecast ON stock_data.stock_id = stock_forecast.stock_id WHERE forecast_date = '2022-12-31'
SELECT stock_name, historical_data FROM stock_data WHERE JSON_EXTRACT(historical_data,'$.2022-06-30.close') > 100 ORDER BY stock_name ASC
SELECT * FROM HistoricalStockData ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT stock_symbol, open_price FROM HistoricalStockData WHERE close_price > 100 ORDER BY open_price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT stock_symbol, close_price FROM HistoricalStockData WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY close_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT model_name, accuracy FROM PredictiveModels ORDER BY accuracy DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT model_name, model_description FROM PredictiveModels WHERE accuracy > 0.8 ORDER BY model_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM HistoricalStockData ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT stock_id, stock_symbol, open_price, close_price FROM HistoricalStockData WHERE close_price > 100 ORDER BY open_price ASC;
SELECT stock_symbol, date, close_price FROM HistoricalStockData WHERE stock_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT model_name, accuracy, model_description FROM PredictiveModels WHERE accuracy >= 0.8 ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT model_id, stock_id, training_date, training_data FROM ModelTrainingData WHERE model_id = 1 ORDER BY training_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM StockPrices ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT open_price, close_price, high_price FROM StockPrices WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT date, revenue, net_income FROM FinancialIndicators WHERE revenue > 1000000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT analyst_name, recommendation_rating FROM StockAnalysts WHERE accuracy_score > 0.8 AND analyst_coverage LIKE '%technology%';
SELECT date, sector, volume FROM MarketData WHERE sector = 'Finance' ORDER BY volume DESC;
SELECT * FROM StockPrices ORDER BY date DESC, close_price ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT date, open_price, close_price FROM StockPrices WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY close_price DESC;
SELECT analyst_name, accuracy_score FROM StockAnalysts WHERE accuracy_score > 80 ORDER BY accuracy_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT date, revenue, eps, roe FROM FinancialIndicators WHERE roe > 15 ORDER BY revenue ASC, eps DESC;
SELECT date, overall_sentiment FROM MarketSentiment WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC, overall_sentiment DESC;
